title: MINES AND QUARRIES (CONTROL OF BUILDINGS, ETC.) ACT
title_en: MINES AND QUARRIES (CONTROL OF BUILDINGS, ETC.) ACT

provisions.content: section 259 of the Minerals and Mining Act; [Cap. M12.] " quarry " has the like meaning as in

section 232 of the Minerals and Mining Act. 2 . Short title This Act may be cited as the Mines and Quarries (Control of Buildings, etc.) Act. MINES AND QUARRIES (CONTROL OF BUILDINGS, ETC.) ACT SUBSIDIARY LEGISLATION N o Sub s idi a r y L eg i s l ation
